profile.name: Dillan Khurana
profile.title: Full Stack Engineer & Agentic AI Developer
profile.description: I engineer scalable full stack systems and intelligent agentic frameworks. My work blends modern software engineering with AI-driven automation, focusing on reliability, performance, and real-world impact.

about.content:
I'm a Computer Science and Math student at the University of Virginia, with industry experience at Amazon, Alarm.com, and 10Pearls. My focus is on full stack engineering and agentic AI development.

I've engineered platforms serving thousands of users, built pipelines for multimodal AI, and created open-source frameworks for agentic development. My core stack includes React, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and cloud infrastructure (AWS + Azure).

I thrive at the intersection of software and AI: designing systems that are scalable, modular, and capable of orchestrating intelligent agents. Outside of work, I love tennis, poker, and playing piano with my band.
highlights: Created Dillagent, a framework for building production-ready agentic AI applications
Built and deployed Demon Time, an open-source interview prep platform with roadmaps and spaced repetition
Software Engineering Intern at Amazon (AWS) — engineered large-scale internal tooling for notifications
Video AI Intern at Alarm.com — designed pipelines for multimodal LLM testing and evaluation

experience.description: Engineered full-stack infrastructure and tooling for regional build notifications at scale.
achievements: Automated regional build notifications for 12,000+ subscribers, saving 600+ engineering hours annually
Built a React + Python dashboard for configuring notification templates
Provisioned infrastructure with AWS CDK including DynamoDB, S3, and IAM

experience.description: Worked on pipelines and evaluation systems for multimodal AI camera deterrence features.
achievements: Developed scoring algorithms for multimodal LLM-generated outputs
Designed an Azure pipeline for procuring and storing test data
Improved modularity and scalability of internal integration services

experience.description: Developed sentiment analysis pipelines and full stack apps for pharmaceutical clients.
achievements: Finetuned LLMs for sentiment classification across social media and journals
Built a React + FastAPI web app to analyze KOL statements
Led end-to-end testing efforts across the project stack

projects.title: Dillagent
projects.description: A high-level framework for building production-ready agentic AI applications.
projects.longDescription: Dillagent provides abstractions for LLMs, Tools, Agents, and Executors, enabling structured workflows for intelligent systems. Includes support for multi-agent pipelines, retrieval augmented generation, and custom tool execution.

projects.title: Demon Time
projects.description: An open-source technical interview prep platform with community-driven roadmaps.
projects.longDescription: Full-stack platform with coding problem tracking, spaced repetition, and community-built roadmaps. Includes roadmap builder, subscription system, and real-time conversations with Claude API.
